dict.string: The popular belief that it can be seen from space is actually just a myth.
Some parts are estimated to be over 2300 years old.
The Great Wall took 1800 years to build.
What started as a collection of walls built to keep nomadic armies at bay were eventually connected to form the walls that you see today.
Only two thirds of the wall at its peak still stands today.
New sections of the wall are still being discovered.
Over 20 different dynasties were involved in the building of the Great Wall over the years.
The Great Wall was built mostly atop mountain ridges due to their strategic importance.
The Great Wall was also instrumental in protecting the famed silk road and its economic value
Most of what we see today was built during the Ming Dynasty, the last period where large scale wall building was implemented
